Traits.Name: Smothering Aura
Traits.Content: The Suffocating Plastic Bags emit a faintly suffocating aura in a 15-foot radius. Any creature that starts its turn within this aura must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or is considered Blinded until the start of its next turn.

Traits.Name: Floating Distraction
Traits.Content: The Suffocating Plastic Bags are difficult to pinpoint due to their erratic floating movements. The first attack roll made against them each turn has disadvantage.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Suffocating Plastic Bags make two attacks: one suffocating wrap and one sharp flurry.

Actions.Name: Suffocating Wrap
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft.; one creature. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be incapacitated until the end of its next turn, struggling against the suffocating bags.

Actions.Name: Sharp Flurry
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft.; one creature. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage as the razor-thin edges of the bags slice through. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or take additional damage equal to 1d6 from being caught by flailing plastic bag edges.
